xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.6 Hetuduka, Vitakkattika » 1.6.1 Savitakkasavicārapada » 1.6.1.7 Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Vitakkattika
Savitakkasavicārapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
216.
411Hetu savitakkasavicāro dhammo hetussa savitakkasavicārassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
217.
412Nahetuyā nava, naārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
413Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
414Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
415(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< Hetvādiup1.6.2 Avitakkavicāramattapada >>
